title: Hiring a Video Editor for Long-Term Collaboration
job_overview:
We are looking for a reliable, long term video editor to produce videos for our faceless channels. 3-4 videos per week, each around 20-30 minutes long. We will provide script, audio file, and some images for the videos (made up to ~30-40% of the videos). You will need to source more images/footages for the rest.

The editing is basic: images/footages matching the voiceover, simple effects & transition, occasional keywords as caption, and simple sound effects. Each video should take not more than 3-4 hours.

Pay: $25 per video (so around $300~400 a month, not including performance bonus)

Requirements:
- Reliable, able to meet deadline
- Responsive to communication
- Honest
- Strong attention to details
- It is preferred that you have storyblocks, or any stock footage accounts 
- Any AI image/video generation skill is a plus

How to apply?
Send us your portfolio, use 7 Apply Points and mention Octopus in the letter. 
Tell us why you are the best fit for this job.
Selected applicants will need to complete a 1-2 minute sample test before joining.

You are welcome to ask any question in mind.

If you're looking for a long-term role, with numeral incentives that tie to your effort, and want to grow with a media company, this is the chance. Once we found you suitable, full time position may be offered in the future.

Thank you and let's work together to create something great.
